pages.text: Beagles were originally bred as hunting dogs, specifically for hunting hares.$(br2)Standing at just over half a block tall, these sharp-nosed dogs come in three coats.
Beagles are found most commonly in taigas and old growth taigas. You can also find them in flower forests and meadows, and more rarely in deserts.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Rabbit Treat.
